S

saveConfig() - Method in class IrcPlugin
Saves configuration options for this plugin from 'config' to the config file - If no 'config' is unset (loadConfig never called), this method will not attempt to save anything
savePluginProperties(String, Properties) - Method in class IrcPluginManager
Saves properties for a specified plugin name
sdata - Variable in class IrcEvent
additional string data associated with the event, if any.
sendCommand(IrcCommand) - Method in class IrcBot
Queue sending an IRC Command defined by an IrcCommand object This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
sendCommand(IrcCommand) - Method in class IrcSession
Converts, and sends an IRC Command object as a PRIVMSG to the server NOTE: this function assumes 'account' to be from/origin field of the reply sent.
sendEvent(IrcEvent) - Method in class IrcPluginManager
Synchronously processes an IrcEvent object against plugins This method should generally not be used by plugins if it can be avoided.
sendMessage(String, String) - Method in class IrcBot
Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] to a specific destination This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins.
sendMessage(IrcMessage) - Method in class IrcBot
Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] defined by an IrcMessage object.
sendMessage(IrcMessage) - Method in class IrcSession
Converts and sends an IRC Message object as a PRIVMSG to the server.
sendMessage(IrcOrigin, String, String) - Method in class IrcSession
Formats and sends a message (PRIVMSG) [based on message details] to the server
sendMessage(String, String) - Method in class IrcSession
Formats and sends a message (PRIVMSG) [based on message details] to the server.
sendRaw(String) - Method in class IrcBot
Queue sending a raw IRC Command string to the server This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
sendRawLine(String) - Method in class IrcSession
Send a single IRC Command line of text to the server
sendReply(IrcMessage, String, boolean) - Method in class IrcBot
Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] in reply to a received IrcMessage This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins.
sendReply(IrcMessage, String, boolean) - Method in class IrcSession
Creates, Converts, and sends a reply message to an IRC Message object as a PRIVMSG to the server NOTE: this function assumes 'account' to be from/origin field of the reply sent.
sent - Variable in class IrcSession
Running count of IRC Commands sent during the object lifetime
server - Variable in class IrcOrigin
server name sending the message, if the message was not sent by a user
server - Variable in class IrcSession
IRC Server being connected to
session - Variable in class IrcBot
Session object used for controlling the IRC connection
session - Variable in class IrcPlugin
The IRC session object used by the bot - Provides control over the bot connection to the plugin.
setAccountDetails(String, String, String, String) - Method in class IrcSession
Set user information (transmitted to server on initial connections).
setConnectionDetails(String, int) - Method in class IrcSession
Set details about the IRC Server to connect to.
start() - Method in class IrcBot
Queue the BOT_START message to plugins to indicate beginning of operations.
startHandler(IrcEvent, int) - Method in class IrcPlugin
Method used by PluginManager to start and time-limit plugin handling inside a thread
state - Variable in class IrcBot
The current state of the Bot/connection
state - Variable in class IrcEvent
The current bot state at the time the Event was dispatched
stop() - Method in class IrcBot
Dispatch the BOT_STOP message to plugins to indicate end of operations.
